p.mixed-citation:
Al‐Ani AH ,
Prentice RE ,
Rentsch CA , et al. Review article: prevention, diagnosis and management of COVID‐19 in the IBD patient. Aliment Pharmacol Ther. 2020; 00: 1– 19. 10.1111/apt.15779

fn.p: The Handling Editor for this article was Professor Jonathan Rhodes, and this uncommissioned review was accepted for publication after full peer‐review.
Aysha H. Al‐Ani and Ralley E. Prentice should be considered joint first authors.
